text: SafetySuit (or Safety Suit and Safetysuit) is an American rock band formed in 2008. They are famous for the hit singles Someone Like You and Stay. Safety Suit has released only 1 hit studio album called Life Left to Go in July 2008. ==Discography== ===Songs=== * Someone Like You (2008) * Anywhere But Here (2008) * Stay (2009) ===Albums=== * Life Left to Go (2008) * Someone Like You - EP (2008) Category:American rock bands Category:Post-grunge bands Category:Musical groups from Oklahoma
title: SafetySuit
